text: Ana nehu'za zamagra Bali havi anumzante'ma mono'ma huntesaza kumatami tro huntesga hu'ne'za, ne' mofavre'zamia zamahe'za Bali havi anumzantega tevefi kre fanenehu ofa nehaze. Nagra kea huramante'na, e'ina hiho hu'na huozamante'noa avu'avaza nehu'za, Nagri antahi'zampinena e'inahu antahi'zana omane'neaza tro hu'naze.
